summary: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.
cast: Pierre Brasseur|Alida Valli|Juliette Mayniel|Alexandre Rignault|Béatrice Altariba|Charles Blavette|Claude Brasseur|Michel Etcheverry|Yvette Etiévant|René Génin|Lucien Hubert|Marcel Pérès|François Guérin|Edith Scob|France Asselin|Charles Bayard|Gabrielle Doulcet|Corrado Guarducci|Brigitte Juslin|Charles Lavialle|Max Montavon|Jimmy Perrys
title: Les yeux sans visage
